spiritsExplanation:
The workout is titled "All Over the World Row" and involves outdoor reality rowing, which suggests an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. The description highlights exploring various Hydrow destinations, reinforcing the exploration and natural setting aspect, thus scoring 0.95 for "Outdoor & Adventure."

The workout also features 1' on 1' off intervals with a max rhythm of 28 strokes per minute and is categorized as "sweat," indicating a focus on cardio and exertion. This aligns with a "High-Energy & Intense" spirit, scoring 0.7, as the intervals and music genres like Dance and Global Hits likely maintain a high energy level.

Other spirits like "Flow & Rhythm" or "Soothing & Restorative" are less relevant due to the structured interval format and outdoor nature of the session, which focuses more on intensity and exploration.
